sourcesContent:
Registration

Authorization

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CookingService } from '../cooking.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-authorization', templateUrl: './authorization.component.html', styleUrls: ['./authorization.component.css'] }) export class AuthorizationComponent implements OnInit { public isRegirtrated : boolean = true; constructor (private cookingService: CookingService) {} changeState(){ this.isRegirtrated = !this.isRegirtrated; } signIn(email: string, password: string): void { this.cookingService.userSignIn(email, password).subscribe(token => this.cookingService.token = token); } signUp(userName: string, email: string, password: string): void { this.cookingService.userSignUp(userName, email, password).subscribe(); } ngOnInit() : void { } }
